text: I was struck with this on two fronts: (1) since reading an article about the direction dogs face when they poop, I wanted to track that with my own dog, out of curiosity. But it was way too time-consuming to write it down in Notes and later transfer it to a google spreadsheet
and (2) sometimes I sleep in and my housemates let my dog out of his crate in the morning. Did they feed him? What should they feed him if I'm not awake to answer their questions?
I suppose (2) could be solved with a house-wide message board, but I also wanted to learn my dog's eating habits
Of course my ulterior motive here is to collect the data and glean any useful Truths I can out of it
